name: BankRoll
description:
Ludum Dare 44 Submission

Theme: Your life is currency.

A 3D platformer where you swap between coins to reach the finish line.  Each coin has different strengths and weaknesses.  The small coin is speedy and can jump, the big coin is heavy and slow but can break through walls, and the piggy bank soars through the skies like a majestic eagle.

Created by Joe Campanelli and Craig O'Donnell

Music by Craig O'Donnell - https://soundcloud.com/cheebzmusic

Special thanks to Kenney3D - https://kenney.nl/

----  Controls ----

Move - WASD/Arrow Keys

Ability - Space

Small Coin - 1

Big Coin - 2

Piggy Bank - 3

Pause - ESC
